raw: washington arch in greenwich village is seen early in when harry met sally the most memorable scene is the fake scene in the deli. filmed at katz deli on 205 e. houston street on the south west corner of houston and ludlow streets. this deli is also seen in enchanted.

other great scenes in enchanted are when giselle emerges through the manhole cover in times square and the multiple scenes in central park which are just stunning. also featured is the time warner building which is just by central park at columbus circle. opposite is the iconic symbol of the daily planet! crossing over into the park you will stumble upon belvedere castle which is a fairytale in itself in the middle of woodland overlooking a lake. this where julia roberts in stepmom shoots a photo shoot.

also screened is the lovely l'absinthe restaurant 227 east 67th street and 2nd avenue where ed harris amp susan sarandon dine. this film makes me weep every time i watch it but think it has one of the most romantic proposals in a chick flick. talking of proposals how could i not mention tiffany's. a backdrop for many classics little black dresses and diamonds to die for!. but who could resist the gorgeous patrick dempsey taking over the shop for his proposal to reece witherspoon in sweet home alabama.

a must for any ny film fan. found on 5th avenue. where else! several scenes are also filmed within central park for this movie.

a must for any ny film fan. found on 5th avenue. moving up 5th ave back towards the park you will find the metropolitan museum of art fondly known as the met . where jennifer lopez flees from ralph fiennes in maid in manhatten. the hotel that marisa works at in the film is the beautiful and majestic waldorf astoria. several scenes are also filmed within central park for this movie.

no reservations moves south of the island to the village amp brooklyn. bleeker street is used for the restaurant scenes. and the little owl restaurant used as the bistro in the film. the apartment building above was used for the exterior apartment shots for friends!

friendship features in both serendipity and one fine day. both films featuring a trip to the luscious hot chocolate venue serendipity. a fun eatery world famous for its frozen hot chocolate desert! serendipity is one of my christmas movies of choice featuring the plaza wollman ice rink amp bloomingdales. as well as serendipity's one fine day features another iconic eatery in new york 21. its worth a walk past just to see the jockeys if you get a chance to go in the embellished ceilings are fabulous. also seen in one fine day is the great circle line boat cruise. boats also feature in how to lose a guy in 10 days.

but before we talk boats lets talk dresses!. when andie emerges from her apartment on 43 east 5th avenue and 11th street how amazing does she look in that yellow dress?. big hair amp shoulder pads aside this film epitomises the 80's!

but before we talk boats lets talk dresses!. when andie emerges from her apartment on 43 east 5th avenue and 11th street how amazing does she look in that yellow dress?. another night out sees her amp ben take in a knicks game at madison square garden 7th ave amp 33rd st near penn station a romantic day out sees them take the staten island ferry across the hudson past the statue of liberty. this iconic orange ferry started my love affair back in the 80's when i watched melanie griffiths commute from staten island to manhattan in working girl!.

when andie emerges from her apartment on 43 east 5th avenue and 11th street how amazing does she look in that yellow dress?. another night out sees her amp ben take in a knicks game at madison square garden 7th ave amp 33rd st near penn station a romantic day out sees them take the staten island ferry across the hudson past the statue of liberty. this iconic orange ferry started my love affair back in the 80's when i watched melanie griffiths commute from staten island to manhattan in working girl!. big hair amp shoulder pads aside this film epitomises the 80's!

another icon from the 80's is cocktail. not cutting it in wall street brian finds work in baker street pub 1152 1st avenue and east 63rd street and inspired many mixologists today! and finally. how could i not include the most iconic skyscraper and two of the most romantic films.

the beautiful empire state building 350 5th avenue and west 34th street. which is the mistress in both an affair to remember and sleepless in seattle. the crowds may be larger now but still one of the most frequent meeting places in ny. also seen in sleepless is the plaza hotel tiffany's and the rainbow rooms at the top of the rock. i hope that you enjoyed by chick flicks in the city. all highlighted films will link you to more detailed information . film location maps can be found here.

chick flicks in the city. i'm a chick flick girl not ashamed to admit it!. love a good chick flick usually the ones that the critics loath!. i stumbled across this great website which inspired me to blog my favs. check out on the set of new york film locations i'm starting with an icon the seven year itch.

humans of new york a self proclaimed photographic census of new york city has become a social media sensation over the past few months. brandon stanton the photographer behind the ambitious project captures residents and visitors of the five boroughs highlighting their diversity in dress heritage hairstyle and attitude. in any case they offer a rare but impressive insight into the real faces of the people that would come to shape our nation at the turn of the century many of them settling on the lower east side of new york city!
augustus sherman albanian soldier 1906 1914 image courtesy new york public library

humans of new york a self proclaimed photographic census of new york city has become a social media sensation over the past few months. brandon stanton the photographer behind the ambitious project captures residents and visitors of the five boroughs highlighting their diversity in dress heritage hairstyle and attitude. this unofficial record of the ever changing face of new york city isn't the first photography project to document the people that roam new york city.
augustus sherman albanian soldier 1906 1914 image courtesy new york public library

brandon stanton the photographer behind the ambitious project captures residents and visitors of the five boroughs highlighting their diversity in dress heritage hairstyle and attitude. now in the trustworthy hands of the new york public library these pictures once graced the pages of national geographic 1907 and the walls of the lower manhattan headquarters of the federal immigration service. in any case they offer a rare but impressive insight into the real faces of the people that would come to shape our nation at the turn of the century many of them settling on the lower east side of new york city!
augustus sherman albanian soldier 1906 1914 image courtesy new york public library

as we heard yesterday 9 of the 11 businesses on the coney island boardwalk have been given the boot. as tricia at amusing the zillion put it its like a mass wake on the coney island boardwalk at the moment. we won't recognize her. here's some of what you won't see next season

as we heard yesterday 9 of the 11 businesses on the coney island boardwalk have been given the boot. as tricia at amusing the zillion put it its like a mass wake on the coney island boardwalk at the moment. the funeral will be this weekend its goodbye rubys cha chas pauls daughter grill house gyro corner shoot the freak beer island pio pio riko and coney island souvenir shop.

as tricia at amusing the zillion put it its like a mass wake on the coney island boardwalk at the moment. upscale restaurants and middle brow chains the xeroxed world we're all subjected to inured to numbed to and powerless to stop. between thor's demolitions and zamperla's evictions coney island is going to look like a massive car wreck victim after multiple plastic surgeries.
said ruby's co owner to the daily news it's really saying 'to hell with coney island the way it is and the way it was. we want to create a brand new clean coney island for upscale people only. '
said ruby's co owner to the daily news it's really saying 'to hell with coney island the way it is and the way it was. we want to create a brand new clean coney island for upscale people only. '

on our first day of studio in new york city yesterday we visited nyc's high line park. i was familiar with the high line after watching the documentary urbanized 2011 gary hustwit . it's a really unique concept and i quite enjoyed the execution of it.

on our first day of studio in new york city yesterday we visited nyc's high line park. i was familiar with the high line after watching the documentary urbanized 2011 gary hustwit . the project is a really creative innovative answer to both restoration and preserving history as well as creating green space in an urban environment.

on our first day of studio in new york city yesterday we visited nyc's high line park. the project is a really creative innovative answer to both restoration and preserving history as well as creating green space in an urban environment. new york city's high line is an elevated railway track above manhattan's west side which had become overgrown after decades of being unused.

the site for our project has access to the high line the line actually runs right through the site so i'll have many more opportunities to explore this unique place. during the summer the high line park is open from 7 00 am to 11 00 pm. it runs from gansevoort street in the meatpacking district to west 34th street between 10th amp 11th avenues. chelsea market is located at 75 9th avenue between 15th amp 16th streets. to access from the high line take the 16th street exit.

the project is a really creative innovative answer to both restoration and preserving history as well as creating green space in an urban environment. new york city's high line is an elevated railway track above manhattan's west side which had become overgrown after decades of being unused. in 1999 friends of the high line was founded as a community group to preserve the historic structure.

take a bite of the big apple on trafalgars 11 day christmas in new york guided holiday. youll experience a white christmas like never before. five days in new york city will ensure theres plenty of time to take advantage of the christmas shopping sales and to enjoy a once in a lifetime christmas day.

sightseeing highlights midtown and upper manhattan see the rockfeller centre and st patrick's cathedral broadway and central park. catskill mountain visit a loal maple farm and travel through the scenic winter wonderland of mine kill state park. ride to the tope of the rockfeller building for a sweeping view of manhattan.
christmas in new york 2013

christmas in new york 2013

i'm way behind on my posts so i'm going to try to do a bunch this week weekend so you at least get to read about the rest of my new york city trip before school starts again. on our second day in ny we walked a few blocks to grand central station. i can't believe how many people go through grand central every day yet it didn't appear to be overly crowded and we managed to not get lost from there we walked a couple more blocks to the ny public library. a dream place for a reading specialist teacher!!! the empire state building madison square garden in midtown where the ny knicks basketball team plays then made our way through the village soho these two are my favorite areas!

i'm way behind on my posts so i'm going to try to do a bunch this week weekend so you at least get to read about the rest of my new york city trip before school starts again. on our second day in ny we walked a few blocks to grand central station. i can't believe how many people go through grand central every day yet it didn't appear to be overly crowded and we managed to not get lost from there we walked a couple more blocks to the ny public library. a dream place for a reading specialist teacher!!! the empire state building madison square garden in midtown where the ny knicks basketball team plays then made our way through the village soho these two are my favorite areas!

the empire state building the empire state building was designed by william f. lamb from the architectural firm shreve lamb and harmon which produced the building drawings in just two weeks. construction started 1929 completed 1931. from the official site of the empire state building. click here. the empire state building lobby is one of the few interiors in new york to be designated a historic landmark by the landmarks preservation commission.
